name: Discarded (otherworld)
description:
This is the culmination of a bunch of practice, spur of the moment, over roughly a week of time. Seven individuals got together to put their skills together to see if they could develop a bad game. It looks like it might have wound up as something! 

This practice project came to life thanks to the following people: 'Frittoz', 'Judoo', Anthony Flagg, Cassie, 'Skizzy', and Jaye!

Many things learned, through frustration, annoyance, and just playing around. It isn't the best game in the world, but it was a thing that we all did!

This is v1, so more things might come later. There aren't any screen-shots yet, but there are some GIFs taken during the development cycle. Do enjoy this pretty simple game!
